scripts.prepare:mainnet: node scripts/prepareERC20s.js mainnet && mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:rinkeby: node scripts/prepareERC20s.js rinkeby && mustache config/rinkeby.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:matic: node scripts/prepareERC20s.js matic && mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.prepare:mumbai: node scripts/prepareERC20s.js mumbai && mustache config/mumbai.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && yarn codegen
scripts.deploy:rinkeby: yarn prepare:rinkeby && graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ juicebox-dev-rinkeby
scripts.deploy:matic: yarn prepare:matic && graph deploy --product hosted-service cptspacecadet/juicebox-polygon
scripts.deploy:mumbai: yarn prepare:mumbai && graph deploy --product hosted-service cptspacecadet/juicebox-dev-mumbai
